localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: This Visual Studio Code extension allows to easily chat with Slack and Discord directly from the IDEA without the need to change windows or apps.
blogPost.body: This Visual Studio Code extension allows to easily chat with Slack and Discord directly from the IDEA without the need to change windows or apps.
blogPost.title: Chat for VSCode - Chat with your Slack and Discord teams from within VS Code
blogPost.author: Abdelilah Hicham

localize.description: 这个Visual Studio代码扩展允许直接从IDEA中轻松地与Slack和Discord聊天，而不需要改变窗口或应用程序。
localize.tagline: 在VS Code中与你的Slack和Discord团队聊天。

localize.description: 這個Visual Studio代碼擴展允許直接從IDEA中輕鬆地與Slack和Discord聊天，而不需要改變窗口或應用程序。
localize.tagline: 在VS Code中與你的Slack和Discord團隊聊天。

localize.full_text:
印度将禁止CRYPTOS，引入自己的CRYPTOS *。

next.excerpt: Simple web-based game, best played over video call with friends! All players see a random word's category; all but one player (the liar) see the word. Take turns describing the word; at the end, collectively vote on who the liar is. ( https://github.com/fibanneacci/liar)
next.title: who's the liar? - Play this simple web-based game with your friends!

localize.description: 简单的网络游戏，最好和朋友通过视频通话来玩! 所有玩家看到一个随机词的类别；除了一个玩家（说谎者）外，所有玩家都看到这个词。轮流描述这个词；最后，集体投票决定谁是骗子。( https://github.com/fibanneacci/liar)
localize.tagline: 和你的朋友一起玩这个简单的网页游戏吧!

localize.description: 簡單的網絡遊戲，最好和朋友通過視頻通話來玩! 所有玩家看到一個隨機詞的類別；除了一個玩家（說謊者）外，所有玩家都看到這個詞。輪流描述這個詞；最後，集體投票決定誰是騙子。( https://github.com/fibanneacci/liar)
localize.tagline: 和你的朋友一起玩這個簡單的網頁遊戲吧!
